description: A file with .edge extension is Adobe Edge Project file that is created when a project is created and saved with Adobe Edge. Adobe Edge lets web designers to create interactive HTML animators for web, digital publishing, and rich media advertising for both desktop and mobile browsers. This is achieved using HTML/HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Edge files are generated as plain text files and can be opened with several different applications such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, and Notepad++.
